info.title: API Generation Library example APIs
info.description: This is the definition of the **API Generation Library example APIs**.  Hopefully it's interesting

get.description: Get a set of **AdultBorrower**

/top-genres.description: For the specified number of towns, the number of loans for each Genre is returned.

MediaType.description: The types of MediaTitle that the library holds.

tags.name: adult-borrowers
tags.description: A Borrower who can borrow any media and can vouch for Junior Borrowers.

tags.name: borrowers
tags.description: The abstract concept of a Borrower. Actual Borrowers must be either Adult or Junior.

tags.name: county-stats
tags.description: Gets the statistics for each County. For each Town and Borrower the total number of Loans is retrieved.

tags.name: junior-borrowers
tags.description: A Borrower who cannot borrow certain Media Titles and a limited number of Media Copies.

tags.name: librarians
tags.description: A Librarian who can order copies of MediaTitles and may act as a manager or mentor for other librarians.

tags.name: loans
tags.description: The Loan of a specific Media Copy

tags.name: media-titles
tags.description: Details of a Media Title, such as a Book or Movie. This is distinct from a Media Copy which is a particular

tags.name: reservations
tags.description: The Reservation of a Media Title, independent of which actual copy is subsequently loaned.

tags.name: top-genres
tags.description: For the specified number of towns, the number of loans for each Genre is returned.
